name: http://www.canda.io
slogan: Rapidly growing teams with a culture-first approach. 94% of our clients are happy ;)

jobs.title: PPC Account Manager
jobs.description:
We're Brainlabs and we decided that the way marketing is done needed to evolve. So, who better to drive that change than us? We started with the hypothesis that instead of teaching traditional marketers how to do regression analysis or coding, it would be better to hire mathematicians, scientists, programmers and teach them how to do this new kind of marketing.


The last six years has seen us go from one person to an impressive two hundred people, placing us 1st in the Deloitte Tech Track and 4th in the FT1000: a list of Europeâ€™s fastest-growing companies compiled by the Financial Times.

We know that we can't do what we do best without our awesome culture, people and the opportunities we offer to our team... not to mention our investment in providing an exceptional benefits package.

Proud to have shown global networks the difference a smaller, innovative team can make and continued on a YoY 50%+ growth trajectory across our US and UK offices. As part of our continued scaling, weâ€™re looking for PPC Account Managers to join our Biddable team.

Youâ€™ll have the opportunity to meaningfully collaborate with our dynamic and growing team, and partner with our forward-thinking enterprise clients to pioneer paid advertising. We want you to join our Brainlabbers in our mission to deliver the improbable.

What you will be doing:

Optimize paid search campaigns with a clear testing approach and actionable analyses to drive awesome results for clients
Produce insights, reports and commentary for clients to continuously deliver improvements in KPIs
Build trust and relationships with our clients, leading weekly calls and quarterly meetings
Work across various verticals, from B2B and lead gen to retail and ecommerce - you could be managing spend for high-growth independent businesses or large global enterprise clients
Shape agency processes, best practices and tech automation
Help us continue to grow and manage one of the best teams in the world!
So here's what weâ€™d love to see in a Brainlabber:

Positive, collaborative and curious attitude
Love for data
Growth mindset, and solutions-focused approach
Proactive and autonomous contributor
Passion for marketing, numbers and the digital world
Experience in a client-facing Paid Search Account Executive/Management role within Google/Bing shopping or have worked in paid media advertising with hands-on experience of Google Ads
Whatâ€™s in it for you?
